query:
SELECT 
  SUBSTRING_INDEX(indicatorCode, '_', 1) as source,
  COUNT(*) as record_count,
  MIN(YEAR(date)) as earliest_year,
  MAX(YEAR(date)) as latest_year
FROM time_series 
GROUP BY SUBSTRING_INDEX(indicatorCode, '_', 1)
ORDER BY record_count DESC
LIMIT 20;
command:

  SUBSTRING_INDEX(indicatorCode, '_', 1) as source,
  COUNT(*) as record_count,
  MIN(YEAR(date)) as earliest_year,
  MAX(YEAR(date)) as latest_year
FROM time_series 
GROUP BY SUBSTRING_INDEX(indicatorCode, '_', 1)
ORDER BY record_count DESC
LIMIT 20;
